name: Bring Back Potatoes!
description:
Bring Back Potatoes! Help the potatoes get back to the restaurant!

The potatoes have gotten stuck on the other side of the motorway and don't understand how traffic works... Use your bell to safely guide them back home to the restaurant!

Press Z or X to ring the bell. That will Start and Stop the potatoes from moving.

This was created in 3 hours for Trijam #175. Inspired by their theme "Bring Back Potatoes" and that time the CEO of Taco Bell appeared on an advert as a potato...

Bulit from scratch in Pico-8, because Pico-8 is awesome!
